item.title: Barrows hp ~~( my way to degrade barrows )~~ could use some help though
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

[quote=“hippie, post:25, topic:135982”][quote author=King Tom link=topic=187465.msg1694418#msg1694418 date=1187862831]
Why would you want to make Barrows armor degrade? Don’t you like it always having full strength??
[/quote]

im making degrading barrows becuase its not a common thing in private servers, and if i were to code them, atleast i’d have that to my self and say, yeh i coded that Myself.

newb, yes i am using that.

i put it into a command, so i could test the outcome of a degrade.

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“hattrick”)){
deleteequiment(1153, playerHat);
setEquipment(1149, 1, playerHat);
playerEquipment[playerHat]=1149;

updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
GetBonus();
ResetBonus();

	WriteBonus();

}
[/code][/quote]

if you read that you would see that i put an update in there -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows hp ~~( my way to degrade barrows )~~ could use some help though
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

lol!
im sorta iffy on this… i multi logged, and i swear ive been killen my other acc for 30 mins.
i even set my code to this

if (toragsHP == 500){
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4958)) 
if(playerEquipment[playerChest] == (4964))
if(playerEquipment[playerLegs] == (4970))
if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == (4952)){
toragsHP -= hitDiff * 2;
}
} else if (toragsHP == 375){
sendMessage("Your Torags have degraded! Check your inventory!");
deleteequiment(4958, playerWeapon);
deleteequiment(4964, playerChest);
deleteequiment(4970, playerLegs);
 	      
 addItem(4959, 1);
 addItem(4965, 1);
 addItem(4971, 1);
 addItem(4953, 1);

}

( no this isnt the final code lol. its jus in a testing phase )

the hitDiff * 2… should subtract the torags hp… i think im missing something, but idk what… hmm… seems funny, people said they actualy have degrading barrows. where are they now :eek:
HELLOO!?
listens echo

EDIT
i think… im missing something… i just dont know what…

Read full topic

im making degrading barrows becuase its not a common thing in private servers, and if i were to code them, atleast i’d have that to my self and say, yeh i coded that Myself.

newb, yes i am using that.

i put it into a command, so i could test the outcome of a degrade.

 if (command.startsWith("hattrick")){
deleteequiment(1153, playerHat);

appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

item.title: Barrows hp ~~( my way to degrade barrows )~~ could use some help though
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

Tom, many people want servers more like Runescape, but easier to train in so they can have the power like maxed people on Runescape do. They create private servers because they’re not very good at Runescape, and realise how shitty it is. Then they want to recreate it, and they find Moparscape and then they make a server so they can have their updates wanted with some updates that Runescape has, so they can enjoy the fun.

Your question is like asking Jagex why they’re brittish. The answer is obvious if you don’t know what it is, it’s because their parents are brittish, they live in England, or whatever, and are Brittish. Anymore to add? I don’t think so, so please refrain from asking retarded questions anymore. Thanks

-The Cupcake Fairy.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows hp ~~( my way to degrade barrows )~~ could use some help though
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

the actual code for it going from normal to 100% would be something like

if (toragsHP >= 375){ if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4747 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4749 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4751 && playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4745) { toragsHP - hitdiff/2; } } else if (toragsHP <= 374){ sendMessage("Your Torags armor has degraded!"); //Deletes their armor deleteequiment(4745, playerHat); deleteequiment(4969, playerChest); deleteequiment(4751, playerLegs); deleteequiment(4747, playerWeapon); // Add the degraded armor below player.playerEquipment[playerHat]=4952; player.playerEquipment[playerChest]=4964; player.playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4970; player.playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4958; }

this is just a small edit from InfoManiac’s so 99% goes to him/her

Read full topic
